Package xyz.cathal.answerbox

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BrowseAnswersFragment.DisplayAnswersCommunicator
    This interface is used to communicate with the DisplayAnswersFragment.
    HomeFragment.BrowseAnswersCommunicator
    Allows communication to BrowseAnswers.
    OnBackPressedListener
    Interface implemented by Fragments that use back button to move to the previous fragment
    SavedAnswersFragment.DisplaySavedAnswerCommunicator  
    TaskListener
    This interface allows Fragments to communicate with one another.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Answer
    This class represents an Answer as defined by the remote database.
    AnswerAdapter
    This Adapter is used to populate the list of solutions with data.
    AnswersDatabaseContract
    This contract class is a container for constants that define names for URIs, tables and columns.
    AnswersDatabaseContract.FilesTable  
    AnswersDatabaseContract.SolutionsFilesTable  
    AnswersDatabaseContract.SolutionsTable  
    AnswersDatabaseContract.UsersTable  
    AnswersDatabaseHelper
    A helper class to manage database creation and version management.
    BrowseAnswersFragment
    A fragment that displays a list of items by binding to an ArrayList of Answers.
    BrowseRequest
    Represents a request to browse for solutions.
    BrowseResponse
    Represents a response from the server, following a BrowseRequest.
    ChangePasswordRequest
    Represents a request to change the users password.
    Comment
    This class represents a Comment as defined by the remote database.
    CommentAdapter
    This Adapter acts as a bridge between the comment data (an ArrayList of Comments) and the View which holds the data.
    CommentRequest
    Represents a request to submit a comment.
    CommentResponse
    Represents a response from the server, following a CommentRequest.
    DeleteCommentRequest
    Represents a request to submit a comment.
    DisplayAnswerFragment
    This Fragment displays a solution chosen by the user.
    DisplaySavedAnswerFragment  
    File
    This class represents a File as defined by the remote database.
    FileDownloadRequest
    Represents a request to download a file.
    FileDownloadResponse
    Represents a response from the server, following a FileDownloadRequest.
    FileUploadRequest
    Represents a request to upload a file.
    FileUploadResponse
    Represents a response from the server, following a FileUploadRequest.
    FileUtility
    A helper class to assist with various aspects of file management
    HomeFragment
    This Fragment represents the Home screen.
    ImageActivity
    This Activity simply displays a large image.
    InputValidator
    A helper class to assist with validating user input from various contexts.
    LoginActivity
    This Activity is the entry point of the application.
    LoginRequest
    Represents a request to authenticate a user.
    LoginResponse
    Represents a response from the server, following a LoginRequest.
    LogoutRequest
    Represents a request to log a user out.
    MainActivity
    The applications main activity, containing the navigation bar and managing all fragments.
    NetworkUtility
    Checks for an internet connection
    NonScrollListView
    Defines a non scrolling ListView
    PasswordActivity
    This activity allows the user to change their password.
    ProfileFragment
    This Fragment allows the user to modify their account settings and update personal information.
    RegisterActivity
    A register screen that offers register via email/password.
    RegisterRequest
    Represents a request to create an account.
    RegisterResponse
    Represents a response from the server, following a RegisterResponse.
    ReportRequest
    Represents a request to the server to report a solution.
    ReputationRequest
    Represents a request to update an answers reputation.
    Request
    An abstract superclass representing a generic request made to the server.
    Response
    A superclass representing a generic response from the server.
    SavedAnswerAdapter
    This Adapter is used to populate the list of saved answers with data.
    SavedAnswersFragment
    A fragment that displays a list of saved Answers by binding to an ArrayList of Answers.
    Server
    This class represents the remote server which hosts our API.
    SubmitAnswerActivity
    This Activity allows the user to submit a new solution.
    SubmitAnswerRequest
    Represents a request to submit a new solution.
    SubmitAnswerResponse
    Represents a response from the server, following a SubmitAnswerRequest.
    User
    This class represents a User as defined by the remote database.
